sense.def:
To have an urge to do or have something
pomeni imeti močno željo, da bi nekaj naredili ali imeli.

seg.quote: They have a strong urge to communicate.
...our insane urge for greater and greater material wealth.

sense.def:
To urge someone to do something
pomeni nekoga močno prepričevati, naj nekaj naredi.

seg.quote: I urged him to take a year off to study drawing.
‘At least stay for Christmas,’ Pam urged.
She urged that I should support the girls.

sense.def:
To urge a course of action
pomeni svetovati, da je na vsak način treba ravnati na določen način;
